title: Cant log in ( after fix )
body: heard there was a log in issue yesterday but i still cant log in. Says unable to connect to authentication service

replies.body: If you're still having problems getting a solid connection with the authentication servers, the best first steps to take are generally updating your port forwarding and DNS servers settings to try and get a cleaner link with those servers. If you aren't sure how to update those, check out the steps listed in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
